title: Psychonaut
description: Satori is in love and he isn’t going to let a little matter like death get in the way. His girlfriend's tortured and broken body awaits him, but does she really need him to save her? His rival, a rage-filled young woman, grows more powerful and becomes as twisted as the ribbons in her hair. The demon, Lilith, draws each of them inexorably towards her. Who will survive the coming battle?Full of sex and magic, “Psychonaut” is an exploration into the human psyche and the second book in Voiez’s “Starblood” trilogy."Carmilla Voiez is more of a singer than a writer. She tells her compelling story in a hypnotic, distinctive voice that brings her eerie world vividly to life."Graham Masterton
author: Carmilla Voiez
